channel.title: Need help with port forwarding
channel.description: i am at portforwarding.com trying to port frward on sbc dsl, which doesn't have a gamming button in it's router, and i can not find moparscape on the gaming list. Is it under a different name?

item.title: Need help with port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

no it is not under porftforwarding.com… here is what you have to do… go to* start -> connections -> right click on you router -> proporties ( you will see your ip adress) -> copy your ip adress & paste it in ur internet explorer or firefox adress bar -> click go -> it asks you for a admin id and pass (put in the id and pass u made from regeistering your router) -> go into add port -> and fill out the rest -> click create -> logg out of that -> and you are dont with setting up your router! ( and hopefully you know how to open the port on you computer)

hope this helped!

Indian

Read full topic
